original_title: Nederlands Dans Theater Celebrates Jiří Kylián
overview: Nederlands Dans Theater performs three ballets: Bella Figura with music by Foss, Pergolesi, Marcello, Vivaldi, and Torelli; Sleepless with music by Dirk Haubrich, and Birth-Day with music by Mozart. Also included is an introduction to each ballet by Jiri Kylian.
tagline: Three ballets from Nederlands Dans Theater: Bella Figura - music by Foss, Pergolesi, Marcello, Vivaldi, and Torelli; Sleepless - music by Dirk Haubrich, and Birth-Day - music by Mozart. Also included is an introduction to each ballet by Jiri Kylian.
title: Nederlands Dans Theater Celebrates Jiří Kylián
